snippet.title: The Glass Staircase - PS2 survival horror
snippet.description:
The Glass Staircase is a homage to ps2 survival horror (especially Haunting Grounds) and Italian zombie movies. Uncover the horrible secrets of the manor as your friends disappear one by one.

Get it at: http://patreon.com/puppetcombo

Music: https://twitter.com/mxxnmoon
